author: jdillon
msg: Replaced velocity with groovy's SimpleTemplateEngine for templating, as velocity does not dereference some of the more magical groovy objects (like proxies and expando)
Updated the testcase template to include all details and render into package directory

author: sebor
msg: * 27.istream.readsome.cpp: New test exercising the member function

author: awiner
msg: Fix a possible NPE when calling resetStampState() on a table that hasn't been processed yet.  And switch an Oracle bug number to a description of the bug

author: jmsnell
msg: Enforce an upper limit to the object pool used by the server implementation.
This ensures that new objects can always be created (the pool will never run dry)
but limits the numbers of pooled objects that are ever retained in memory.
